participant_1.name: Frank Anderson
participant_1.personality: Frank is nurturing and kind-hearted, always willing to lend a hand to those in need. He has a dry sense of humor and enjoys sharing stories from his past.
participant_1.background: i'm a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.

participant_2.name: Emma Johnson
participant_2.personality: Emma is ambitious and compassionate, with a zest for life. She is sociable and enjoys connecting with new people, which helps her in her job at the bar.
participant_2.background: i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i do not like chicken. i've blonde hair and blue eyes. i'm in college to become a nurse.
